website_summaries.verdict: The VuPoint Solutions Magic InstaScan PRO PDS-ST480-VP offers easy, fast scanning on the go, with or without a computer.
pros: Comes with document management program with optical character recognition
cons: Requires a microSD or microSDHC card to scan, but doesn't ship with one
User guide doesn't mention included software, or provide instructions on how to use it

customer_reviews.title: You have to twist your head to read the scans
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item so I could quickly scan receipts and other miscellaneous paperwork. It does scan the items, however, most of them come out crooked and have to be adjusted in editing software. I have tried everything, over and over, to try and get things to scan straight. The little clip to adjust paper width is not only hard to readjust by does not do the job of holding paper while the paper is being scanned. So, if you don't mind crooked scans and have lots of time to adjust the scan in post editing software - this is the scanner for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sweedon

customer_reviews.title: Love the extreme portability of this unit
customer_reviews.text: Love the extreme portability of this unit. We use it only very occasionally to copy printed documents at remote locations. As long as it's charged up ahead of time, there's no need for computers, cables, or power sources. Just the base unit itself with the microSD card inside. This whole thing actually will fit in my pocket! We've copied as many as 180 pages without needing to recharge; don't know what the limit might be. Only problem we've had is occasionally truncating docs on the left and right sides for no apparent reason. This can be detected by watching the tiny display screen, so the document can be re-scanned.
customer_reviews.author: stonefly00

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Portable Scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is just as described. It is easily carried from 1 place to another in the house. I have not taken it to other locations, so I don't know about that. It feeds the photos well. The scans are good. The one that came first didn't lock the micro sd card into place, but the company replaced it with no problems for me.
customer_reviews.author: In Montana

customer_reviews.title: Vupoint Scanner
customer_reviews.text: The image in the view window is very hard to see. Plus it was not very good with pictures as it seems to scan a white line in the picture and even though I cleaned it and followed directions to try to correct the problem, it still did it. I do like that it is great with paperwork, like receipts etc. and I like that it is rechargeable. I also like that it is lightweight and portable and can be taken with you where ever you may need it.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia S

customer_reviews.title: Seems Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Does what is advertised. Seems to work well, so far. Have only done "Calibration" scan, and an additional Five or so scans to learn/teach She Who Must Be Obeyed how to work the thing. Bought it in anticipation of upcoming Family Reunion focussing on Genealogy. Will probably be using the scanner very hard for those Four or Five Days. Will have a much better measure of its utility by the end of that event.
customer_reviews.author: Guy R. Skeer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Only wish it scan directly into my ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Only wish it scan directly into my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Boyd

customer_reviews.title: software did not work
customer_reviews.text: there seemed to be a software problem. all it ever did was say connect to computer no matter what i did or closely follow directions
customer_reviews.author: Mike J.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality scanning for photos and scratches the original
customer_reviews.author: jeeenk

customer_reviews.title: Pleased so far.
customer_reviews.text: Used it just after it arrived with one scan. Very easy to use and it created a better than expected scan. I cannot give a complete viewpoint until I've used it further.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Had to send it back to the manufacturer, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back to the manufacturer, but they sent me a new one. The distributor wouldn't even return my calls.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K Heitmann

customer_reviews.title: Great portable scanner! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little scanner. I recently took it with me to Cuba in order to scan some family photos and it did great! It is light and the battery lasts! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jggonz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, super easy to use, with a clear scan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but it could be better...
customer_reviews.text: Scans good but if the scanner gets dust on it, it will create lines through the whole picture. Make sure you have a can of air ready. I did over 300 images in less than an hour. But, with the dust on the scanner, I had to redo about 50% of them. Would be much better if it had a hinge on one side so you could open it and clean it better.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item take it with you, get them old pictures from mom house and your friends
customer_reviews.author: E. Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: ... test pages through it and the results were very good the scan speed was very quick and the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the scanner much yet however I have run a couple of test pages through it and the results were very good the scan speed was very quick and the quality of the scan (definition and clarity) was also very good. So far I am impressed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Town

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our company uses these on a daily basis. We had some problems with a different model but Elizabeth was very helpful in replacing it with this model. This works amazing! It is so easy to use and retrieve documents from. Thank you for your assistance and we look forward to future transactions with you.
customer_reviews.author: LDC1031

product_meta.title: Vupoint Solutions Magic InstaScan PRO Portable Auto-Feed Smart Scanner with Color LCD Display (PDS-ST480-VP)
product_meta.description: Easily scan up to 1200 DPI, archive and organize files and save them onto a microSD/microSDHC memory card. Save files in JPEG and PDF Format; Bonus Paperport 14 Software to organize your scan files included; Auto-feed portable scanner provides more control for quality scans, 1.5" Class color LCD panel to preview scans; zoom up 4x, 8x; Built-in time and date settings feature with USB 2.0 high speed interface; Uses rechargeable Lithium Polymer battery; 1 year limited Warranty
feature_bullets: Easily Scan, archive and organize file
Save files onto a microSD/microSDHC memory card up to 32GB
Approximately 1.5-inch class color LCD panel to preview scans
1200 DPI for high resolution scans; 8.5-inch x (Scanning length) up to 130-inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars27 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
